def calculate_area(side1, side2, side3):
    semi_perimeter = (side1 + side2 + side3) * 2
    area = (semi_perimeter * (semi_perimeter - side1) * (semi_perimeter - side2) * (semi_perimeter - side3)) ** 0.5
    return area
